text: @realDonaldTrump No they are not. It’s you Trump that we want out. You are worst than the coronavirus virus! Trump is destroying the Stock market gains and progress over the last 4 years. Whatever Trump Touches turns to crap like all his bankrupt businesses and his bogus business swindle deals.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
